scripts.web:dev: yarn run ui-library:build && yarn workspace @notes-app/web run dev
scripts.web:build: yarn run ui-library:build && yarn workspace @notes-app/web run build
scripts.electron:dev: yarn run ui-library:build && yarn workspace @notes-app/electron dev
scripts.electron:preview: yarn run ui-library:build && yarn workspace @notes-app/electron preview
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "ui-library,electron,web" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "yarn run ui-library:watch" "yarn run electron:dev" "yarn run web:dev"
scripts.build: concurrently --names "ui-library,electron,web" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "yarn run ui-library:build" "yarn run electron:preview" "yarn run web:build"
scripts.lint: concurrently --names "ui-library,electron,web" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "yarn run ui-library:lint" "yarn run electron:lint" "yarn run web:lint"
